item.title: U.S. CPI Data Could Push Treasury Yields Higher
item.description: Treasury yields were higher and could rise further if inflation data are higher than expected, Brown Brothers said.

item.title: U.S. CPI Data Could Push Dollar Higher
item.description: The U.S. dollar rose and could rise further if inflation data are higher than expected, Brown Brothers said.

item.title: Nasdaq Futures Rise as Investors Await Inflation Data
item.description: U.S. stock futures were muted, split between small gains and losses as traders await consumer-price index data.

item.title: Crypto Industry Hopes Trump Can Finally Get Them Bank Accounts
item.description: Crypto venture capitalists and founders are counting on the incoming administration and a new pressure campaign to repair relationships with big banks...

item.title: How Booming Leveraged Funds Can Incinerate Your Money
item.description: Variants soon might include long-short funds resembling steel-cage matches.
